column4: I'm just checking, can anybody actually see my messages right now? If no one can help me, that's cool, but I'd feel pretty stupid if for some reason I was actually talking to no one and waiting for a reply.
Can anyone help me with my FTP server under 11.10? Stopped working, and I don't know why...
hello?
Hey, Jordan. I asked before but didn't hear anything. I honestly wasn't sure if anyone could even see my messages....
Anyway:
I had proftpd installed before I went 11.10
along with GADMIN proftpd to manage it.
After 11.10, gadmin would start, but it couldn't start the server. I don't recall the error message, but
I've reinstalled both gadmin and proftpd several times, no dice so far.
sudo apt-get install vsftp   or   sudo apt-get install proftpd
What is gadmin?
ftp localhost   #See if it is running.
Sorry, I've not had any experience with gadmin
tried ftp localhost and got 421 service not available
sudo apt-get install vsftp   or   sudo apt-get install proftpd
I did proftpd already, so I guess I'll try vsftp. Thanks!
If you already have proftpd just use it.
sudo apt-get install proftpd
I did that already.
apt-get remove proftpd ; apt-get install vsftpd
alright, I'll try that. Again, thanks for your help and your patience.
